Sentencas: An integrated power generation cycle combining thermochemical recuperation, brown coal gasification and a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) was proposed based on the concept of thermochemical recuperative energy.
Titulo: Combination of thermochemical recuperative coal gasification cycle and fuel cell for power generation

Sentencas: Process simulation combining the coal gasifier, gas turbine cycle, and SOFC module was conducted using the ASPEN Plus process simulation tool.
Titulo: Combination of thermochemical recuperative coal gasification cycle and fuel cell for power generation

Sentencas: The simulation indicated that the cycle efficiency increases from 39.5% (HHV) without the SOFC to about 45% (HHV) with the SOFC.
Titulo: Combination of thermochemical recuperative coal gasification cycle and fuel cell for power generation
